message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counteroffer at $120 for the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand that you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $135.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $125 for the product.
Hi Bob, thank you for your latest counteroffer. I'm still not willing to go as low as $125. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer the product to you for $132.
